passage_text: Lyndsey is a variant spelling of Lindsay. The name Lindsay is a transferred use of a Scottish surname, that of Sir Walter de Lindesay who derived the name from the territory of Lindsey in Lincolnshire. Lindsay is derived from the Old English lindesig meaning lindum isle or lincoln's marsh from the elements lindes meaning lindum and ig meaning island.
Lyndsey means a forest of linden trees. Lyndsey is a variant of Lindsay. Lindsay was originally an English surname derived from the place name in Lincolnshire and it's meaning is wetland of Lincoln..

In Scottish, the name Lyndsey means-A lake; a place of linden trees.. Other origins for the name Lyndsey include-Scottish, English, English.The name Lyndsey is most often used as a girl name or female name.

The name Lyndsey is an English baby name. In English the meaning of the name Lyndsey is: A lake; a place of linden trees. Scottish Meaning: The name Lyndsey is a Scottish baby name. In Scottish the meaning of the name Lyndsey is: A lake; a place of linden trees. American Meaning: The name Lyndsey is an American baby name. In American

Meaning of Lyndsey. English name. In English, the name Lyndsey means-camp near stream. Other origins for the name Lyndsey include-English, Scottish.The name Lyndsey is a unisex name and can be used for a boy or girl name (male or female).
